question: Is yazeed is kafir or Muslim...as you know that he murderd Hadrat hussain and their felows in which his brother and sons was their in karbala battle
answer:
QUESTION
Mufti sahab Please tell me if Yazeed is kafir ormuslim, as you know that he murderd Hadrat hussain and their felows in which his brother and sons was their in karbala battle
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, ?The beauty of a person?s Islam is to leave those things that do not concern him/her.?

As a Muslim, it is not necessary to know whether Yazeed is a Muslim or not. On the day of Qiyaamat, we will not be questioned about that. Our efforts should be directed towards what we will be accountable for. Our Imaan and our practices and obedience to Allah and His Rasul (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
